name: Voxite Staff
description:
"The eternal alchemy is stirred by the staff."
—Anonymous

name: Voxite Staff
description:
"The eternal alchemy is stirred by the staff."
—Anonymous

name: Windblessed Longbow
description:
"May the winds bless the flight of your bolts."
—Sangdo Swiftwing

name: Lost Focus
description:
"Will these portals never end? I'd like to complete my research."
—Historian Garrod

name: Hidden Speargun
description:
"It has a secret secondary fire method in case some undead jam up the main action."
—Nessa

name: Moa Rancher's Torch
description:
"The caves around here are deep and very dark. We always keep torches to search for the moas."
—Cassie

name: Trader's Dagger
description:
"I keep these daggers sharp, just in case of an attack."
—Lexi Price

name: Lion's Fang Model II
description:
"Trade can never stop."
—Lionguard

name: Hunting Pistol
description:
"If you unload with this, there's usually not much left worth bringing back."
—Hunter Block

name: Pagga's Shield
description:
"Its too bad this wont block the stench of this place."
—Magister Pagga

name: Shelter Short Bow
description:
"We received a shipment of these. Of course, I've made improvements."
—Scholar Maroola

name: Miner's Mace Mark G
description:
"My own invention. You probably can't see all the subtle enhancements I've made, but your enemies will certainly feel them."
—Gilli

name: Kohlopoi Spear
description:
"Quaggan made it extra sharp."
—Varonos Parump

name: Seraph-Issue Axe
description:
"There are better axes, but out here, a blade's a blade when it comes to protecting our families."
—Barnaby

name: Elmder's Mace
description:
"Show any weakness and centaurs will be on you like flies on carrion."
—Seraph Elmder

name: Sharpened Seraph-Issue Axe
description:
"When we do get shipments, I try to handpick some of the better pieces for heroes like you."
—Barnaby

name: Historian's Staff
description:
"What brings the spirits here?"
—Historian Garrod

name: Seraph-Issue Shield
description:
"Recover, reuse, recycle. The equipment we recover is usually a lot less banged up than the soldier."
—Sergeant Yarbrough

name: Togatl Trident
description:
"Sometimes you have to fight to eat."
—Matlal

name: Enhanced Miner's Mace Mark G
description:
"My own invention. You probably can't see all the subtle enhancements I've made, but your enemies will certainly feel them."
—Gilli

name: Backwoods Dagger
description:
"Out here, you can't settle for the run of the mill. These have my own special little modifications."
—Waldo

name: Lion's Claw Model II
description:
"Trade can never stop."
—Lionguard

name: Speargun
description:
"I remember this one year when the crabs were stealing all my bait..."
—Fisherman Will

name: Portal Shatterer
description:
"Perhaps now they'll stay closed."
—Historian Garrod

name: Waldo's Special Torch
description:
"I have my own special recipe that makes these burn a little hotter than normal. Watch your eyebrows."
—Waldo

name: Militia Sword
description:
"Remember, attack as they lower their guard."
—Sergeant Neal

name: Waldo's Torch
description:
"Bandits hate fire."
—Waldo

name: Truffle-Baited Trident
description:
"Fish love the truffle."
—Matlal

name: Tamini Torch
description:
"They burn us; we burn them."
—Seraph

name: Shadowed Researcher's Staff
description:

description:

description:

description:
